vote.text: Amendment SA 1855 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1855 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 1618. (consideration: CR S7700; text: CR S7758-7804) To provide a perfecting amendment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1855 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1855 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 1618.
